      • createTable

        public com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.table.client.CloudTable createTable(String tableName)
                                                                        throws URISyntaxException
        Creates the table in the storage service if it does not already exist.
        Parameters:
        tableName - A String that represents the table name.
        Returns:
        The created table or null
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException - If the resource URI is invalid

      • insertEntity

        public com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.table.client.TableResult insertEntity(String tableName,
                                                                        com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.table.client.DynamicTableEntity entity)
                                                                          throws com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.core.storage.StorageException
        Insert an entity in the given table, provided that the table exists
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table where to insert the entity
        entity - An instance of the DynamicEntity
        Returns:
        A TableResult containing the result of executing the TableOperation on the table. The TableResult class encapsulates the HTTP response and any table entity results returned by the Storage Service REST API operation called for a particular TableOperation.
        Throws:
        com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.core.storage.StorageException - - if an error occurs accessing the storage service, or the operation fails.

      • getEntities_withRange

        public com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.core.storage.ResultSegment<com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.table.client.DynamicTableEntity> getEntities_withRange(String tableName,
                                                                                                                                                        com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.core.storage.ResultContinuation[] continuationToken,
                                                                                                                                                        int pageSize)
                                                                                                                                                          throws InvalidKeyException,
                                                                                                                                                                 URISyntaxException,
                                                                                                                                                                 IOException,
                                                                                                                                                                 com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.core.storage.StorageException
        Extracts the entities contained in a given table in batches
        Parameters:
        tableName - The table name
        continuationToken - The next point where to start fetching entities. Pass null at the beginning.
        pageSize - The number of entities to retrieve. NB: 1000 max otherwise throws a StorageException
        Returns:
        A collection containing the entities, the continuationToken and other stuff.
        Throws:
        InvalidKeyException
        URISyntaxException
        IOException
        com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.core.storage.StorageException
